info.name: Clean UI for Gmail
info.description:
A cleaner and more modern UI for Gmail web app with a taste of material/flat design.
It will give more space to your messages and a more touch-friendly UI to your mailbox.

NOTE: built on top of classic Gmail UI (prior to June 2018)
info.additionalInfo:
v.0.3.5 - Added new icons for categories and menu toggle, fixed Gmail classes
v.0.3.1 - Compatibility fixes
v.0.3.0 - Added menu icons, fixed logo and search bar
v.0.2.0 - Fixed Gmail classes, improved menu and labels appearance
v.0.1.3 - Aligned with latest Gmail changes
v.0.1.2 - Fixed bugs introduced by Gmail classes changes
v.0.1.1 - Updated Gmelius extension support
v.0.1.0 - Initial release

Use with Default Gmail theme

-------------------

Additional notes:
(optional) Use 'GMelius' free extension to add a toggler to hide/show the upper search bar

data.title: Love this style. But corporate/business accounts need a fix for the custom logos. Attached CSS fix
